solution_line_template: He gives a third of {total_oranges} oranges to his brother which is {total_oranges}*({brother_fraction_numerator}/{brother_fraction_denominator}) = <<{total_oranges}*({brother_fraction_numerator}/{brother_fraction_denominator})={oranges_given_to_brother}>>{oranges_given_to_brother} oranges

He gives a fourth of {oranges_remaining_after_brother} oranges to his friend which is {oranges_remaining_after_brother}*({friend_fraction_numerator}/{friend_fraction_denominator}) = <<{oranges_remaining_after_brother}*({friend_fraction_numerator}/{friend_fraction_denominator})={oranges_given_to_friend}>>{oranges_given_to_friend} oranges
